body:
### Problem

Rename a folder, eg. old_folder to new_folder.

In nvim:

    filter /file_in_old_folder/ brow oldfiles

then pick a file that used to be in old_folder and nvim crashes.

BUT picking from

    brow oldfiles

works fine.

### Steps to reproduce

    
    :filer /pat/ brow oldfiles

pick a file that doesn't exist any more and nvim crashes.

### Expected behavior

Not crash.

### Nvim version (nvim -v)

NVIM v0.11.0-dev-1300+g1077843b9b-dirty

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

no

### Operating system/version

window 10

### Terminal name/version

cmd

### $TERM environment variable

 ---

### Installation

  build from repo
